p: The pulse width plays also a major role in material laser processing [ 42, 43, 44, 45]. The effect of pulse width on micro-hardness distribution is shown in Figure 10. When the pulse width increased, the micro-hardness value in the hardened layer increased as well. The micro-hardness value in sample #8 reached 665 Vickers. A high amount of energy was transferred to the surface of the sample, which caused higher hardness.
